feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.3: Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump oj from 3.16.3 to 3.16.4 (#2230) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.940.0 to 1.941.0 (#2229) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump sprockets-rails from 3.4.2 to 3.5.1 (#2227) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump parallel from 1.24.0 to 1.25.1 (#2226) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump builder from 3.2.4 to 3.3.0 (#2224) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.82.0 to 1.83.0 (#2219) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.151.0 to 1.152.0 (#2220) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.939.0 to 1.940.0 (#2218) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.41.3

..and go to http://localhost:5100

  • API Documentation

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.41.6: Helm Charts, Safeties & Dependency Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Add helm lint action (#1589) Thanks @MindTooth!
  • Fix New Contributor Greeting (#2253) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Adjust helm chart to runAsNonRoot (#2252) Thanks @domi2120!
  • Add Locale Safety (#2259) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump high_voltage from 3.1.2 to 4.0.0 (#2198) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump stringio from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 (#2258) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump erubi from 1.12.0 to 1.13.0 (#2257) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump nokogiri from 1.16.5 to 1.16.6 (#2256) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.152.2 to 1.152.3 (#2254) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@MindTooth, @dependabot, @dependabot[bot], @domi2120 and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.41.6

..and go to http://localhost:5100
